comments.body: ITEMS LIST (Auction for ColdKey victims of the apparent theft):____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________1) ONE 1 oz 999 fine silver 2022 BTC Lealana coin (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank) (Donated by Smoothie)2) ONE 1/2 oz 999 fine silver 2013 Litecoin 10 LTC (BUYER FUNDED holo marked, no key, or blank) (Donated by Smoothie)3) ONE 1/4 oz 999 fine GOLD Bitcoin Penny 2018 year (original packaging with hologram in tact) (Donated by Smoothie)4) ONE Alpen Coin Vreneli 2.0 Brilliant serial A034 loaded with 0.001 BTC (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________5) Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver plated bar serial D199 loaded with 0.005 BTC (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)6) Alpen Coin roll 25x christmas edition ceramic chip unloaded. (no holo) (Donated by Frank AlpenCoin)7) ONE Unloaded (peeled) 2016 0.1btc microsoul gold plated bar, with 2 holograms (Donated by Henkcryptotank) ONE Moonbits 2018 alloy/silver finish 1k bits (Loaded 0.001B) X1 (Donated by QuakerBull)____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________9) 2x 1 BTX Moonbits titan finish chip (Donated by Kryptowerk)10) ONE BTC metal plate (out of only 16 made) (Donated by Kryptowerk)11) ONE 3 coin set of unfunded ravenbit cryptopods  Copper #18, Brass #51, Bronze #84 (Donated by Est2013)12) ONE half silver ball from the Itokawa wallet...
